targets.query: SELECT count(*) FROM (SELECT last("cpu_cores") FROM "kvmtop.domains" WHERE time >= now() - 180s GROUP BY "UUID" fill(none))

SELECT
 sum("mean_cpu_cores") as "vm_cpu_cores"
FROM 
( SELECT mean("cpu_cores") as "mean_cpu_cores" FROM "kvmtop"."autogen"."kvmtop.domains" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "UUID" FILL(none) )
GROUP BY time($__interval) FILL(none)

SELECT
 sum("mean_ram_total") as "vm_ram_total"
FROM 
( SELECT mean("ram_total") as "mean_ram_total" FROM "kvmtop"."autogen"."kvmtop.domains" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "UUID" FILL(none) )
GROUP BY time($__interval) FILL(none)

SELECT count("value") FROM (
  SELECT count("cpu_cores") AS "value" FROM "kvmtop.domains" WHERE $timeFilter  GROUP BY  time($__interval), "UUID" fill(none)
)
GROUP BY  time($__interval)
show tag values cardinality from "kvmtop"."autogen"."kvmtop.hosts" with key = "host_name"

SELECT
 sum("mean_cpu_cores") as "cpu_cores"
FROM 
( SELECT mean("cpu_cores") as "mean_cpu_cores" FROM "kvmtop"."autogen"."kvmtop.hosts" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "host_name" FILL(none) )
GROUP BY time($__interval) FILL(none)

SELECT
 sum("mean_ram_total") as "pm_ram_total"
FROM 
( SELECT mean("ram_Total") as "mean_ram_total" FROM "kvmtop"."autogen"."kvmtop.hosts" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "host_name" FILL(none) )
GROUP BY time($__interval) FILL(none)

SELECT count("value") FROM (
  SELECT count("cpu_cores") AS "value" FROM "kvmtop.hosts" WHERE $timeFilter  GROUP BY  time($__interval), "host_name" fill(none)
)
GROUP BY  time($__interval)

SELECT
 sum("mean_cpu_cores") as "vm_cpu_cores"
FROM 
( SELECT mean("cpu_cores") as "mean_cpu_cores" FROM "kvmtop"."autogen"."kvmtop.domains" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "UUID" FILL(none) )
GROUP BY time($__interval) FILL(none)

SELECT
 sum("mean_cpu_cores") as "pm_cpu_cores"
FROM 
( SELECT mean("cpu_cores") as "mean_cpu_cores" FROM "kvmtop"."autogen"."kvmtop.hosts" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "host_name" FILL(none) )
GROUP BY time($__interval) FILL(none)

SELECT
 sum("mean_cpu_cores") as "vm_cpu_cores",
 sum("mean_cpu_total") / sum("mean_cpu_cores") * 100 as "vm_cpu_util"
FROM 
( SELECT mean("cpu_total") AS "mean_cpu_total", mean("cpu_cores") as "mean_cpu_cores" FROM "kvmtop"."autogen"."kvmtop.domains" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "UUID" FILL(none) )
GROUP BY time($__interval) FILL(none)

SELECT
 sum("mean_io_read_bytes") as "io_read_bytes",
 sum("mean_io_write_bytes") as "io_write_bytes"
FROM 
( SELECT mean("io_read_bytes") AS "mean_io_read_bytes", mean("io_write_bytes") as "mean_io_write_bytes" FROM "kvmtop"."autogen"."kvmtop.domains" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "UUID" FILL(none) )
GROUP BY time($__interval) FILL(none)

SELECT
 sum("mean_io_read") as "io_read",
 sum("mean_io_write") as "io_write"
FROM 
( SELECT mean("io_rchar") AS "mean_io_read", mean("io_wchar") as "mean_io_write" FROM "kvmtop"."autogen"."kvmtop.domains" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "UUID" FILL(none) )
GROUP BY time($__interval) FILL(none)

SELECT
 sum("mean_ram_used") as "vm_ram_used",
 sum("mean_ram_total") as "vm_ram_total"
FROM 
( SELECT mean("ram_used") AS "mean_ram_used", mean("ram_total") as "mean_ram_total" FROM "kvmtop"."autogen"."kvmtop.domains" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "UUID" FILL(none) )
GROUP BY time($__interval) FILL(none)

SELECT
 sum("mean_net_receivedBytes") as "vm_received",
 sum("mean_net_transmittedBytes") as "vm_transmitted"
FROM 
( SELECT mean("net_receivedBytes") AS "mean_net_receivedBytes", mean("net_transmittedBytes") as "mean_net_transmittedBytes" FROM "kvmtop"."autogen"."kvmtop.domains" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "UUID" FILL(none) )
GROUP BY time($__interval) FILL(none)

SELECT
 sum("mean_net_transmittedDrop") as "mean_net_transmittedDrop",
 sum("mean_net_transmittedErrs") as "mean_net_transmittedErrs",
 sum("mean_net_transmittedFifo") as "mean_net_transmittedFifo",

 sum("mean_net_receivedDrop") as "mean_net_receivedDrop",
 sum("mean_net_receivedErrs") as "mean_net_receivedErrs",
 sum("mean_net_receivedFifo") as "mean_net_receivedFifo"
FROM 
( SELECT 
  mean("net_transmittedDrop") AS "mean_net_transmittedDrop", mean("net_transmittedErrs") AS "mean_net_transmittedErrs", mean("net_transmittedFifo") AS "mean_net_transmittedFifo", mean("net_receivedDrop") AS "mean_net_receivedDrop", mean("net_receivedErrs") AS "mean_net_receivedErrs", mean("net_receivedFifo") AS "mean_net_receivedFifo"
 FROM "kvmtop"."autogen"."kvmtop.domains" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "UUID" FILL(none) )
GROUP BY time($__interval) FILL(none)

SELECT
 sum("mean_cpu_steal")  AS "vm_cpu_steal"
FROM 
( SELECT mean("cpu_steal") AS "mean_cpu_steal" FROM "kvmtop"."autogen"."kvmtop.domains" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "UUID" FILL(none) )
GROUP BY time($__interval) FILL(none)

SELECT
 sum("mean_cpu_other_total")  AS "vm_cpu_overhead"
FROM 
( SELECT mean("cpu_other_total") AS "mean_cpu_other_total" FROM "kvmtop"."autogen"."kvmtop.domains" WHERE $timeFilter AND cpu_other_total < 100 GROUP BY time($__interval), "UUID" FILL(none) )
GROUP BY time($__interval) FILL(none)

SELECT
 sum("mean_ram_cmajflt") as "mean_ram_cmajflt",
 sum("mean_ram_cminflt") as "mean_ram_cminflt",
 sum("mean_ram_majflt") as "mean_ram_majflt",
 sum("mean_ram_minflt") as "mean_ram_minflt"
FROM 
( SELECT 
  mean("ram_cmajflt") AS "mean_ram_cmajflt", mean("ram_cminflt") AS "mean_ram_cminflt", mean("ram_majflt") AS "mean_ram_majflt", mean("ram_minflt") AS "mean_ram_minflt" 
 FROM "kvmtop"."autogen"."kvmtop.domains" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "UUID" FILL(none) )
GROUP BY time($__interval) FILL(none)
